title: The One With Ross' New Girlfriend

questions.question: What does Phoebe say happened to Ross and Rachel so far in the series?
options: Ross was in love with Rachel, but she didn't feel the same way
Ross and Rachel were together, but then they broke up
Ross was in love with Rachel, but every time he tried to tell her, something got in the way
Ross and Rachel hated each other
questions.correct_answer: Ross was in love with Rachel, but every time he tried to tell her, something got in the way
questions.explanation: Phoebe recaps the story of Ross and Rachel, explaining that Ross has been in love with Rachel since forever, but every time he tried to tell her, something got in the way.

questions.question: What is Rachel's reaction when she sees Ross with Julie at the airport?
options: She is happy for Ross and Julie
She tries to make a break for it and falls down
She ignores them and walks away
She confronts Ross about his new relationship
questions.correct_answer: She tries to make a break for it and falls down
questions.explanation: Rachel sees Ross with Julie at the airport and tries to make a quick exit, but falls down in the process.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Ross brings to Central Perk?
options: Julie
Rachel
Monica
Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: Julie
questions.explanation: Ross brings Julie to Central Perk to introduce her to his friends.

questions.question: Why did Ross and Julie go to the baby's place?
options: To visit their friend's baby
To see Ross' sister's baby
To see Ross' and Julie's baby
To attend a baby shower
questions.correct_answer: To visit their friend's baby
questions.explanation: Ross and Julie went to the baby's place, but the context implies they were visiting a friend's baby, not their own.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Rachel when she asks him what Ross said about his relationship with Julie?
options: He said they're having a great time
He said he's still in love with you
He said Julie is a great person
He said he's not interested in a relationship
questions.correct_answer: He said they're having a great time
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Rachel that Ross said he and Julie are having a great time, which makes Rachel unhappy.

questions.question: What is the name of the guy Rachel slept with after seeing Ross with Julie?
options: Paulo
Ross
Joey
Chandler
questions.correct_answer: Paulo
questions.explanation: Rachel slept with Paulo after seeing Ross with Julie, which she later regrets.

questions.question: What does Phoebe agree to do for Monica?
options: Give her a massage
Cut her hair
Cook her dinner
Go shopping with her
questions.correct_answer: Cut her hair
questions.explanation: Phoebe agrees to cut Monica's hair, but only after Monica promises not to be too controlling.

questions.question: What is the problem with Monica's haircut?
options: It's too long
It's too short
It's uneven
It's the same as before
questions.correct_answer: It's too short
questions.explanation: Monica is unhappy with her haircut because it's too short, which Phoebe gave her after a misunderstanding about the style.

questions.question: What does Joey tell Rachel about Ross' feelings for her?
options: He's never felt that way about anyone before
He's only in love with her as a friend
He's been in love with her for 10 years
He's not interested in her romantically
questions.correct_answer: He's been in love with her for 10 years
questions.explanation: Joey tells Rachel that Ross has been in love with her for 10 years, which makes Rachel realize her feelings for Ross.

questions.question: What does Chandler accuse Frankie of doing?
options: Taking advantage of him financially
Measuring his inseam inappropriately
Not doing a good job on his pants
Being rude to him
questions.correct_answer: Measuring his inseam inappropriately
questions.explanation: Chandler accuses Frankie of taking advantage of him by measuring his inseam in an inappropriate manner.

questions.question: What does Ross tell Rachel about Paulo?
options: He's a great guy and she should be with him
He's scum and she deserves better
He's okay, but not good enough for her
He's not his type
questions.correct_answer: He's scum and she deserves better
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that Paulo is scum and she deserves someone better, which shows his concern for Rachel's well-being.

questions.question: What is the name of the actress that Phoebe mistakenly thinks has a haircut that Monica wants?
options: Demi Moore
Andie McDowell
Mary Tyler Moore
Rodney McDowell
questions.correct_answer: Andie McDowell
questions.explanation: Phoebe mistakenly thinks Andie McDowell is the actress with the haircut Monica wants, but actually, Monica wants Demi Moore's haircut.

questions.question: What does Phoebe ask Rachel to confirm about Andie McDowell?
options: If she's an actress
If she's a model
If she's in the movie Four Weddings and a Funeral
If she's a guy from Planet of the Apes
questions.correct_answer: If she's the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral
questions.explanation: Phoebe asks Rachel to confirm if Andie McDowell is the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral, which Rachel corrects her about.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she asks to talk to him?
options: He says he's busy and can't talk
He says he's happy to talk to her
He says he's not interested in talking about his relationship with Julie
He says he's going to break up with Julie for her
questions.correct_answer: He says he's happy to talk to her
questions.explanation: Ross agrees to talk to Rachel when she asks him, which shows his willingness to communicate with her.

questions.question: What does Joey say is one of his gifts?
options: Being able to sense when women are happy
Being able to sense when women are depressed and vulnerable
Being able to cook well
Being able to dance well
questions.correct_answer: Being able to sense when women are depressed and vulnerable
questions.explanation: Joey claims that one of his gifts is being able to sense when women are depressed and vulnerable, which he uses to try to help Rachel.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross when he asks if there's a 'second of all'?
options: She says there is a second of all and tells him something else
She says there isn't a second of all and ends the conversation
She says she doesn't know what he's talking about
She says she's not interested in talking to him
questions.correct_answer: She says there isn't a second of all and ends the conversation
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Ross that there isn't a second of all, which ends their conversation and leaves Ross unsure of what to do next.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her haircutting skills?
options: She's very confident in her abilities
She's not very good at cutting hair
She's only good at cutting men's hair
She's only good at cutting women's hair
questions.correct_answer: She's not very good at cutting hair
questions.explanation: Phoebe admits that she's not very good at cutting hair, which is evident from Monica's bad haircut.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey about Frankie?
options: He's a great tailor and Chandler recommends him
He's a bad tailor and Chandler doesn't recommend him
He's a good tailor, but Chandler had a bad experience with him
He's not a tailor at all
questions.correct_answer: He's a bad tailor and Chandler doesn't recommend him
questions.explanation: Chandler warns Joey about Frankie, saying that he's a bad tailor and had a bad experience with him.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel about how he feels about her?
options: He says he's still in love with her
He says he's not in love with her anymore
He says he's happy for her and Paulo
He says he's just friends with her
questions.correct_answer: He says he's happy for her and wants her to be with someone who appreciates her
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that he wants her to be with someone who appreciates her and makes her happy, which shows his concern for her well-being.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Chandler about Frankie's measuring technique?
options: He says it's inappropriate and Chandler should be upset
He says it's a normal part of measuring pants
He says he's never heard of it before
He says it's only done with certain types of pants
questions.correct_answer: He says it's a normal part of measuring pants
questions.explanation: Joey explains to Chandler that Frankie's measuring technique is a normal part of measuring pants, which makes Chandler realize he overreacted.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about doing Julie's haircut?
options: She's excited to do it and thinks it will be a great experience
She's nervous about doing it and hopes she doesn't mess it up
She's not interested in doing it and tries to get out of it
She's only doing it because Julie is Ross' girlfriend
questions.correct_answer: She's willing to do it and asks Julie about the style she wants
questions.explanation: Phoebe agrees to do Julie's haircut and asks her about the style she wants, which shows her willingness to help.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Phoebe about Andie McDowell?
options: She's an actress in the movie Four Weddings and a Funeral
She's a guy from the movie Planet of the Apes
She's a model and not an actress
She's a singer and not an actress
questions.correct_answer: She's an actress, but Phoebe has incorrect information about her
questions.explanation: Rachel corrects Phoebe's misunderstanding about Andie McDowell, explaining that she's an actress, but not the one Phoebe thinks she is.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she asks him to talk?
options: He says he's busy and can't talk to her
He says he's happy to talk to her and listens to what she has to say
He says he's not interested in talking to her about his relationship with Julie
He says he's going to break up with Julie for her
questions.correct_answer: He says he's happy to talk to her and listens to what she has to say
questions.explanation: Ross agrees to talk to Rachel and listens to what she has to say, which shows his willingness to communicate with her.

questions.question: What does Joey tell Chandler about his experience with Frankie?
options: He says Frankie is a great tailor and he's been going to him for years
He says Frankie is a bad tailor and he had a bad experience with him
He says Frankie is okay, but not the best tailor
He says he's never been to Frankie before
questions.correct_answer: He says Frankie is a great tailor and he's been going to him for years
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that Frankie is a great tailor and he's been going to him for years, which makes Chandler realize that Frankie's measuring technique is normal.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Monica about her haircut?
options: She says it's perfect and she loves it
She says it's not what she wanted, but it's okay
She says she's sorry and will try to fix it
She says it's a disaster and she can't fix it
questions.correct_answer: She says she's sorry and will try to fix it
questions.explanation: Phoebe apologizes to Monica for the bad haircut and tries to fix it, which shows her willingness to make things right.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel about Paulo?
options: He says Paulo is a great guy and she should be with him
He says Paulo is scum and she deserves better
He says Paulo is okay, but not good enough for her
He says he doesn't know anything about Paulo
questions.correct_answer: He says Paulo is scum and she deserves better
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that Paulo is scum and she deserves someone better, which shows his concern for her well-being.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey about his experience with Frankie?
options: He says Frankie is a great tailor and he recommends him
He says Frankie is a bad tailor and he doesn't recommend him
He says Frankie is okay, but not the best tailor
He says he's never been to Frankie before
questions.correct_answer: He says Frankie is a bad tailor and he doesn't recommend him
questions.explanation: Chandler warns Joey about Frankie, saying that he's a bad tailor and had a bad experience with him.

questions.question: What does Phoebe ask Rachel to confirm about Andie McDowell's haircut?
options: If it's similar to Demi Moore's haircut
If it's a popular style
If it's a good style for Julie
If it's the same as the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral
questions.correct_answer: If it's the same as the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral
questions.explanation: Phoebe asks Rachel to confirm if Andie McDowell's haircut is the same as the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral, which Rachel corrects her about.

questions.question: What does Ross tell Rachel about his feelings for her?
options: He says he's still in love with her
He says he's not in love with her anymore
He says he's happy for her and wants her to be with someone who appreciates her
He says he's just friends with her
questions.correct_answer: He says he's happy for her and wants her to be with someone who appreciates her
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that he wants her to be with someone who appreciates her and makes her happy, which shows his concern for her well-being.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Rachel about Ross' feelings for her?
options: He says Ross is not in love with her
He says Ross is in love with her, but it's not reciprocated
He says Ross has been in love with her for 10 years
He says Ross is just friends with her
questions.correct_answer: He says Ross has been in love with her for 10 years
questions.explanation: Joey tells Rachel that Ross has been in love with her for 10 years, which makes Rachel realize her feelings for Ross.

questions.question: What does Chandler accuse Frankie of doing?
options: Taking advantage of him financially
Measuring his inseam inappropriately
Not doing a good job on his pants
Being rude to him
questions.correct_answer: Measuring his inseam inappropriately
questions.explanation: Chandler accuses Frankie of taking advantage of him by measuring his inseam in an inappropriate manner.
